title: Phantom Lag
body: hey so ive been getting into games when i test my ping with the hextech repair tool and it says i should be getting 42ms. But I still get 90-91 ping all game not to mention that the ping stays at 90 which is fine but my character slides around lagging for like 3 seconds and ive lost a lot of fights because of it. does anyone have the same issue?{{champion:157}}

replies.body:
It sounds like your high latency and sliding around (likely packet loss) are potentially caused by routing issues to the servers. There are ways we can look into your route, but before we do that, we need to ensure your local network settings are good. Our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) is a good place to start with this.

Let me know if you continue to see these issues.

Yes I have gone through the troubleshooting guide I still have the issue Im kinda stuck at this point im going to call my internet provider if there is nothing else to be done thank you for replying {{champion:157}}

You can run some traceroutes so you'll have more data and context to provide your ISP with. I'd like you to use a network app called [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/). After loading up the app, plug in 104.160.131.1 into the host IP field, then start the trace. After it has run for a bit over 5 minutes, export the result as text and paste them here.

Let me know if you have any questions.

It seems your connection spikes up to 234ms at the 198-29-41-1.win-networks.com hop. Since this is on your ISP's infrastructure, your best course of action is to reach out to your ISP's tier 2 support and provide them with this traceroute so they can investigate and resolve this.

Let me know if you have any questions.
